channel.title: Anyone know any cool training places?
channel.description: I'm thinking about expanding to more training zones with more npcs. I got a list of npcs im going to use, but I'm not sure on areas to put them, so I was wondering if you guys can help me out with some cool places you guys use or places that you enjoy training at.

item.title: Anyone know any cool training places?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Clawz fury:

no, and stop making topics like this

please. i really dont think this is what this section is intended for

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know any cool training places?

I’m thinking about expanding to more training zones with more npcs.
